artofillusion.boundingsphere

Class Ritter

  • java.lang.Object
    • artofillusion.boundingsphere.Ritter

  • public class Ritter
extends java.lang.Object
    Ritter2 is an implementation of "An efficient bounding sphere V.2" by Jack Ritter 1990, as described in the published document on www.researchgate.net.

    Variables have been renamed and values for x, y and z are not calculated as separate entities. Vectors are used instead. Also this method recognizes if the first pass produces the final sphere. In that case the fit is marked "EXACT", otherwise "NON_MINIMAL".

    You can use mode(int mode) to have the first pass use the first found or the last found points to define the extemities in each coordinate direction. Which to use was not instructed on the description.

    Version:
    0.02, May-04-2019, for Art of Illusion
    Author:
    Petri Ihalainen, (peteihis)

        public BoundingSphere boundingSphere(java.util.ArrayList<ObjectInfo> infoList)
        Create a boundincg sphere for a selection of objects. If no preview mesh is available for an object, the bounding box is used.
